"Would the monk please call me by my dharma name?
The monk said.
"I've already given up my reputation for gossip.
It was in the tenth year of Xiantong that the monk asked.
On the first day of the third month.
He was tonsured and cleaned.

source_sentence: 端然坐逝大眾號慟移時。
translation: When he was sitting upright and passed away, the public hailed him and moved away.
The teacher suddenly opened his eyes and said.
"A person who leaves home ...
"His mind isn't attached to things.
This is true cultivation.
He toils in birth and calms in death.
What's the point of compassion?'
He then ordered the director of the monastery.
"He asked the director to organize a foolish purification ceremony.
He reprimanded him for his attachment.
It was eight days before he died.
He then passed away while sitting in meditation.
He had lived for sixty-three years.
He was forty-two years old.
He was buried in a stūpa on his native mountain.

source_sentence: 潭州神山僧密禪師(凡五)師與洞山行次。
translation: The Chan Master Saṃmit (v.5) of Shenshan, Tanzhou, was walking with Dongshan.
He suddenly saw a white deer walking by.
The master said.
"How handsome!
Dongshan said.
"How did it grow?
The teacher said.
"It's very similar to a white-robed man worshipping the Buddha.
Didn't he say.
"The old man is great!
Did he say something like this?
The teacher said.
"What's your plan?
Didn't they say.
'I've worn a hairpin for generations.
He temporarily fell into disrepair.
The teacher and Dongshan crossed the river.
Dongshan said.
"Don't get off on the wrong foot.
The master said.
"If you're wrong, then you won't get across.
I wouldn't have gotten across.'
Cūḍa said.
"How does something that's not wrong come about?
The teacher said.
'We'll cross the river together, Elder.'
The teacher and Dongshan went out together.
Cave pointed to the courtyard near the road and said.
'There's someone inside.
He's talking about mind and nature.
The teacher said.
"Who is it?
Cave said.
"When asked by the master, he said.
I was able to go straight to death by ten percent.'
The master said.
"Who's the one who's talking about the mind and explaining its nature?
Cūḷadantī said.
He said, "He's alive in the midst of death.
The teacher put the needle in the hand and asked.
Dongshan asked.
"What's the purpose?
The teacher said.
"Putting the needle in the hand," said Dongshan.
"What's the purpose of putting a needle in your hand?
The teacher said.
"Needles are similar to needles.
And Cave said.
'We've been together for thirty years.'
He made this statement.
Is there such a thing as effort?
The master said.
"Elder, what's the matter?
Dongshan said.
'What's the principle behind the fire that starts in the earth?'
The teacher and Dongshan hoed the tea plantation.
Throwing down the hoe, Dongshan said.
'I'm stuck today.
I don't have a bit of energy.
The teacher said.
'If I don't have any energy, then I won't be able to follow him.'
Would you have given me this path?
Cūḷadantaka said.
"Which one will you say has the strength of energy?
The teacher left at that.

source_sentence: 涿州杏山鑒洪禪師(凡一)臨濟問。
translation: Zhuozhou Xingshan Jianghong Chanshi (Fan Yi) asked Linji.
"Suppose he asks, 'Is this the white ox in the open air?'
The master said.
"Unh-unh!
Ji said.
"Dumbfounded, he said, 'Xing Shan's mouth.'
The teacher said.
"Elder, what's your birth?
Ji said.
"This animal!
The teacher then gave up.
Youxi Wushang (Fan Yi) The monk asked.
"The great function is manifested.
"It doesn't exist as a rule.
What happens then?
The monk circled the rope-bottomed monk's seat once and sat down.
The monk wanted to say something further.
The teacher gave him a tap.
The monk returned to his seat and stood up.
The teacher said.
'You think so?'
I don't think so.
You don't think ...
Yet, I do.'
The monks then spoke further.
The teacher again gave him a clap of the foot.
"Thirty years from now.
My path will be greatly practiced.'
Luen Deng Huiyao, Vol. 20
